    • Method Detail

      • getCraftStack

        public static ItemStack getCraftStack(ItemStack instance)
        Returns a CraftItemStack instance representing the specified instance. If reflective NBT operations are to be performed on this stack, it is recommended to wrap the constructor in this call. If the ItemStack instance is already a CraftItemStack, that instance will be returned.

        The return of this method will be null if any of the following are true:

        • Reflective utilities are not compatible with this server.
        • An unexpected error occurs.
        Due to this behavior, no exceptions except argument invalidity exceptions will be thrown from this method.

        Parameters:
        instance - The ItemStack instance to convert.
        Returns:
        A CraftItemStack instance, which can hold NBT and NMS data.

      • setItemAge

        public static void setItemAge(Item entity,
              int age)
                       throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                              java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                              java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                              java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                              java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        Sets the number of ticks that an item entity has lived. This call uses reflection to access NMS, as the exposed API methods do not allow changing of this value.
        Parameters:
        entity - The item entity for which to set the age.
        age - The new age, in ticks, of the item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - If an error occurs while reflectively obtaining the NMS handle.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If a security error occurs while reflectively obtaining the NMS handle.
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - If an error occurs while reflectively obtaining the NMS handle.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If an illegal argument is specified to this method.
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a security error occurs while reflectively obtaining the NMS handle.
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - If an error occurs while reflectively setting the age of the NMS item entity such that the appropriate field is not found.

      • sendPacket

        public static void sendPacket(Player player,
              java.lang.Object packet)
        Sends an NMS packet instance to a specific player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who will receive the packet.
        packet - The NMS packet object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If player is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If packet is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If packet is not an instance of the NMS packet type.

      • getCraftPlayerType

        Gets the Class instance representing the org.bukkit.craftbukkit.entity.CraftPlayer implementation class.
        Returns:
        The cached org.bukkit.craftbukkit.entity.CraftPlayer Class instance, or null if it could not be found.

      • getNMSHandle

        public static java.lang.Object getNMSHandle(java.lang.Object entity)
                                     throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                            java.lang.SecurityException,
                                            java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                            java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Gets the NMS handle for the specified CraftBukkit object (this method does NOT return the CraftBukkit class). Should be compatible across versions as it uses reflection. The Method instance is cached internally, so repeated calls to this method with the same parameter type should be relatively efficient.

        Certain classes have special behaviors, and are documented below.

        Class Name Output
        ItemStack A copy of the ItemStack as a net.minecraft.server.ItemStack, as retrieved by static methods in the CraftItemStack implementation class.
        Item The underlying EntityItem instance, as known by the specialized item field in the CraftItem entity implementation class.
        Any CraftBukkit type (with a getHandle method) The return value of that type's getHandle method on that instance.

        Parameters:
        entity - The bukkit object instance for which to retrieve the handle using the getHandle() method.
        Returns:
        The NMS handle for the specified CraftBukkit object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a SecurityManager blocks this operation.
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - If the object does not have an NMS representation retrievable via a CraftBukkit method with the signature of getHandle().
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - If the handle retriever method throws an exception.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If an argument is invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If the method cannot be successfully accessed.
